title: Physical Therapist Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: About an hour interview process with a good flow of questions that related to the position. The questions used critical thinking skills, but weren’t outlandish or difficult, they just needed thought out, educated answers.
Interview Questions: Why are my favorite types of patients to work with?

title: Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY)
Interview Descriptions: I got the casual interview process call - phone screening - formal interview - assessment - offer - negotiate salary - set your schedule - be positive - show interest

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Kaleida Health in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Brief introduction asking about my experience and does the job sound like a good fit and would I be willing to relocate for this position and what do I need for compensation
Interview Questions: Does this job sound like a good fit

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed once (screening) by phone with a Nurse Recruiter/HR, and once Online/video with Unit Manager & Asst Manager. Friendly, positive, upbeat informal chat; talked mostly about my work history.
Interview Questions: They inquired about my ICU experience

title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: Conversational, discussed overview of the position & how my experience aligned with the role. Interviewer was manager of the department, not HR so the discussion was more focused on the work I'd be performing rather than the typical interview questions. Conversation was geared more towards how I could potentially contribute to the success of the department based on my background.
Interview Questions: I was asked about my background & how it was applicable to the role I was interviewing for.

title: Customer Service Representative (CSR) Interview
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview first, then inperson interview. Discussed previous employment. Recruiter was very nice. Discussed benefits. Offer received within a week. Did not accept job offer but was an easy process.
Interview Questions: Are you looking for long term employment

title: Customer Success Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (New York, NY) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: Phone screen with someone from the company. Standard phone screen questions. NO real gotchas or anything out of the ordinary. Didn't move forward after phone screen. Stop making me add more words. I have nothing else to add to the above.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in the position?

title: CT Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (New York, NY) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was great and I loved the manager and she was very nice and helpful and all of the above. I would recommend interviewing with them and would do it again if the job was a fit for you

title: IT Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at Kaleida Health
Interview Descriptions: I applied through an employee at Kaleida Health. I was contacted by a team lead in IT and scheduled an interview over the phone. After passing the over-the-phone interview, I was called in to have a conversation (wouldn't call it an interview) with the team lead and HR. I was subsequently offered an internship.
Interview Questions: Tell me more about your technical skill set.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Kaleida Health in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: The Human resource employee was the interviewer and then on the same day there was an interview with the floor manager.  The interviewer was very pleasant and easy to talk to.
Interview Questions: What made you go into nursing?

title: Nurse Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: I had two interviews, the first was with two managers, one whose position I would be filling due to  a promotion.  The second was intense however physicians and director of specific area were professional, kind, the interview was fluid.
Interview Questions: Why did I want the position?

title: Technology Support Analyst II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: Manager was warm and welcoming, asked tough probing questions that made me think as well as learn what would be expected of me. He showed tremendous knowledge of his are and I knew that I wanted to work for him because of what I’d learn and how I’d be treated. The company is not what I expected but my manager is everything and more than I thought.
Interview Questions: What is more important, taking care of the problem or taking care of the customer?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was average wherein I was asked basic interview questions such as skills that I can use towards the internship, previous experience etc. They were starting a new hospital and the internship was focused towards that.
Interview Questions: How will you utilize your MBA skills towards your internship

title: Occupational Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Williamsville, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Basically they needed OTs and I was hired without a standard interview. My previous employer went out of business and VNA offered to hire the staff that the former employer had to let go.  However, there was no proper exit interview when I left after 7 years when 30 days notice was given.
Interview Questions: What is your level of education

title: Staff Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Kaleida Health in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions:
I asked Bruce Pleskow for job. He said "start tomorrow".   I said don't I need a physical etc.
He said no, we would do the next day. I literally started the enxt day or so. This was an
extremely streamlined process.
Interview Questions: Not many. We knew each other well.

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Kaleida Health (Buffalo, NY) in Nov 2009
Interview Descriptions: I submitted my interest for an opened Administrative Assistant position via online. It was rec'd and I was contacted via telephone to schedule an interview. I was called into the corporate office to be tested on skills and drug test. 3 Days later after taking test I was called in to interview with the Manager of the position I was applying for and was scheduled to go to site to interview. Once I arrived to meet with the Manager I was interviewed by the team in the dept. They were very impressed I was prepared, sharp and flexible. I was offered the position.
